00010 #ifndef BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_DETAIL_FUNCTOR_CRTP_UNARY_AND_UP_ER_2010_HPP
00011 #define BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_DETAIL_FUNCTOR_CRTP_UNARY_AND_UP_ER_2010_HPP
00012 #include <boost/preprocessor/arithmetic/inc.hpp>
00013 #include <boost/preprocessor/repetition/repeat_from_to.hpp>
00014 #include <boost/preprocessor/repetition/enum_binary_params.hpp>
00015 #include <boost/preprocessor/repetition/enum_params.hpp>
00016 #include <boost/preprocessor/repetition/repeat.hpp>
00017 #include <boost/preprocessor/seq/for_each_product.hpp>
00018 #include <boost/preprocessor/seq/first_n.hpp>
00019 
00020 #include <boost/mpl/apply.hpp>
00021 #include <boost/mpl/vector.hpp>
00022 #include <boost/utility/enable_if.hpp>
00023 
00024 #include <boost/assign/v2/detail/config/limit_arity.hpp>
00025 #include <boost/assign/v2/detail/config/limit_lvalue_const_arity.hpp>
00026 #include <boost/assign/v2/detail/config/enable_cpp0x.hpp>
00027 #include <boost/assign/v2/detail/pp/args.hpp>
00028 #include <boost/assign/v2/detail/pp/params.hpp>
00029 #include <boost/assign/v2/detail/pp/seq.hpp>
00030 
00031 #ifndef BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_ENABLE_CPP0X
00032 #error
00033 #endif
00034 
00035 #if BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_ENABLE_CPP0X
00036 #include <boost/mpl/detail/variadic_vector.hpp>
00037 #endif
00038 
00039 // Notation:
00040 //      m = BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_LIMIT_LVALUE_CONST_ARITY
00041 //      n = BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_LIMIT_ARITY
00042 //
00043 // Given a metafunction class, F, and a derived class, D, that defines 
00044 //  template<typename T0, ..., typename Tk>
00045 //  typename apply1<F, mpl::vector<T0,...,Tk> >::type 
00046 //      impl(T0& , ..., Tk&)const;
00047 // for k = 0, ..., n-1, crtp<F,D> defines, under C++03, a set of overloaded 
00048 // operator()'s, each forwarding to impl(), for each combination of lvalues and 
00049 // const arguments for k = 0, ..., m-1, and either only lvalues or only const 
00050 // for k = m, ..., n-1. Under C++0x, operator() forwards to impl() for any 
00051 // combination of lvalues and const and k = 0,...,n-1.
00052 
00053 namespace boost{
00054 namespace assign{
00055 namespace v2{
00056 namespace functor_aux{
00057 
00058         template<typename D,typename F>
00059         class crtp_unary_and_up
00060         {
00061                 protected:
00062 
00063                 D& derived(){ return static_cast<D&>(*this); }
00064                 D const& derived()const{ return static_cast<D const&>(*this); }
00065 
00066                 public:
00067 
00068 #if BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_ENABLE_CPP0X
00069     template<typename T0,typename...Args>
00070     typename boost::mpl::apply1<
00071         F,
00072         typename boost::mpl::detail::variadic_vector<T0, Args...>::type
00073     >::type
00074     operator()(T0&& t0, Args&&...args)const{
00075         return this->derived().template impl<T0, Args...>(t0, args...);
00076     }
00077 #else
00078 
00079 #define MACRO1(r, SeqU) \
00080     template<BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_decl_params(SeqU)> \
00081     typename boost::mpl::apply1< \
00082         F, \
00083         boost::mpl::vector<BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_params(SeqU)> \
00084     >::type \
00085     operator()( BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_decl_args(SeqU) )const{ \
00086         return this->derived().template impl<BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_params(SeqU)>( \
00087             BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_args(SeqU) \
00088         ); \
00089     } \
00090 
00091 
00092 
00093 #define MACRO2(z, n, data) BOOST_PP_SEQ_FOR_EACH_PRODUCT(\
00094         MACRO1, \
00095     BOOST_PP_SEQ_FIRST_N(BOOST_PP_INC(n), BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_SEQ)\
00096 ) \
00097 
00098 BOOST_PP_REPEAT(
00099         BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_LIMIT_LVALUE_CONST_ARITY, 
00100     MACRO2, 
00101     ~
00102 )
00103 
00104 #undef MACRO1
00105 #undef MACRO2
00106 
00107 #define MACRO(z, N, data) \
00108     template<BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(N, typename T)> \
00109     typename boost::mpl::apply1< \
00110         F, \
00111         boost::mpl::vector<BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(N, T)> \
00112     >::type \
00113     operator()( BOOST_PP_ENUM_BINARY_PARAMS(N, T, &_) )const{ \
00114         return this->derived().template impl< \
00115             BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(N, T) \
00116         >( BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(N, _) ); \
00117     } \
00118     \
00119     template<BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(N, typename T)> \
00120     typename boost::mpl::apply1< \
00121         F, \
00122         boost::mpl::vector<BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(N, const T)> \
00123     >::type \
00124     operator()( BOOST_PP_ENUM_BINARY_PARAMS(N, T, const &_) )const{ \
00125         return this->derived().template impl< \
00126             BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(N, const T) \
00127         >( BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(N, _) ); \
00128     } \
00129 
00130 
00131 BOOST_PP_REPEAT_FROM_TO(
00132     BOOST_PP_INC(BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_LIMIT_LVALUE_CONST_ARITY),
00133     BOOST_PP_INC(BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_LIMIT_ARITY),
00134     MACRO,
00135     ~
00136 )
00137 #undef MACRO
00138 
00139 #endif // #if BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_ENABLE_CPP0X
00140 
00141         };
00142 
00143 }// functor_aux
00144 }// v2
00145 }// assign
00146 }// boost
00147 
00148 #endif
